root.title: u.k money market give far help AT new rate
root.body: the bank england say provid market assist afternoon buy bill worth 166 mln stg low rate introduc morn It bought 45 mln stg local author bill plu 27 mln stg bank bill band one 10-3/8 pct togeth 94 mln stg band two bank bill 10-5/16 pct the bank also revis estim market shortag 300 mln stg 250 mln morn It give total assist 213 mln stg today
